div.ab:
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
هذه براه من منصور بن
سليمان عامل الأمير محمّد بن حبيب
أعز اللّه نصره على وسبا ورزم ومدر
للقاروال بن مير إنّك أدّيت إلي ممّا
صار عليك في قصر يسكن وغندر من قسمة
نفقات الأرض ونفقات المهدي ونفقا
پ الامپر وپڤڤه من پحهر الى
أمتع اللّه به من الرّقيق والأسارى
وغير ذلك مع خراج سنة سبع وخمسين ومائة
خمسة دونيق ونصف دانق قبضت
ذلك منك وبرئت إلي منها
وكتب في جمادى الأولى سنة ثمان
وخمسين ومائة
منصور

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
hāḏihi barāʾaẗ:un min manṣūri bni
sulaymāna ʿāmili ăl ʾamīri muḥammadi bni ḥabīb:in
ʾaʿazza ăl lāhu naṣra hu ʿalà wasbā wa rizma wa madra
li ăl qārwāla bni mīr:in ʾinna ka ʾaddayta ʾilay ya mimmā
ṣāra ʿalay ka fī qaṣri yaskina wa ġandara min qismaẗi
nafaqāti ăl ʾarḍi wa nafaqāti ăl mahdiyyi wa nafaqāti
ăl ʾamīri wa nafaqaẗi man taǧahhaza ʾilà ăl mahdiyyi
ʾamtaʿa ăl lāhu bi hi mina ăr raqīqi wa ăl ʾasārà
wa ġayri ḏālika maʿa ḫarāǧi sanaẗi sabʿ:in wa ḫamsīna wa miʾaẗ:in
ḫamsaẗa dawānīqa wa niṣfa dānaq:in qabaḍtu
ḏālika min ka wa bariʾta ʾilay ya min hā
wa kutiba fī ǧumādà ăl ʾūlà sanaẗa ṯamān:in
wa ḫamsīna wa miʾaẗ:in
manṣūr:un

In the name of God, the Merciful and Compassionate.
This is a quittance from Manṣūr ibn
Sulaymān, the financial administrator of the governor Muḥammad ibn Ḥabīb,
may God strengthen his victory, (whose jurisdiction is) over Wasbā (?), Rizm and Madr,
for al-Qārwāl ibn Mīr. You have delivered to me what
you owe in the citadel of Yaskin and Ġandar with regard to the portion
for the expenses of the land, the expenses of al-Mahdī, the expenses
of the governor, the expenses of captives and slaves who equipped themselves to join al-Mahdī,
may God grant him enjoyment (of life),
and other (expenses), (which are administered) with the kharāj for the year one hundred and fifty-seven,
five dānaqs and one half dānaq. I have received
that from you and you have been released from (the obligation to pay) them to me.
It has been written in Jumādā I of the year
one hundred and fifty-eight.
Manṣūr
